main.sql:
select r.id_range||':'||c.id_compet as id , c.description , r.name as rangeName , case c.id_range when 0 then 'type-b,division-e' when 1 then 'type-p,division-e' when 2 then 'type-b,division-e' when 3 then 'type-p,division-e' when 4 then 'type-b,division-u' when 5 then 'type-p,division-u' when 6 then 'type-b,division-u' when 7 then 'type-p,division-u' when 8 then 'type-b, division-e' when 9 then 'type-p,division-e' when 10 then 'type-b,division-e' when 11 then 'type-p, division-e' when 12 then 'type-dl, division-e' when 13 then 'type-dl, division-u' when 14 then 'type-dl, division-e' when 15 then 'type-dl, division-e' when 16 then 'type-dl, division-u' when 17 then 'type-dl, division-e' else '' end as rangeType
, cast(cutfio2(l.name) as varchar(70)) as fio , case l.sex when 1 then 'm' else 'f' end as sex , l.dat_bith , l.town , ac.engname as agecl , wc.name as wc , w.self_weight
, le.squat1 , le.squat2 , le.squat3 , le.squat4 , le.bench1 , le.bench2 , le.bench3 , le.bench4 , le.dl1 , le.dl2 , le.dl3 , le.dl4
, le.oc1 , le.oc2 , le.oc3 , le.oc10 as oc4 , le.oc4 as oc5 , le.oc5 as oc6 , le.oc6 as oc7 , le.oc11 as oc8 , le.oc7 as oc9 , le.oc8 as oc10 , le.oc9 as oc11 , le.oc12 as oc12
, le.summaall as total
from lifter_on_competition loc inner join competit c on c.id_compet = loc.id_compet inner join range r on r.id_range = c.id_range inner join lifter l on loc.id_lifter = l.id_lifter inner join age_class ac on loc.id_agecl = ac.id_agecl inner join weigth_category wc on loc.id_category = wc.id_category inner join wilks w on loc.id_wilks = w.id_wilks inner join lifter_exersis le on loc.id_lifter_compet = le.id_lifter_compet
where c.grp in (select grp from competit where id_compet=%IDC%) order by c.id_range, l.sex, wc.we, ac.to_age, le.summaall desc
